text: "Knocked Out" is the debut single by American singer and dancer Paula Abdul. It released on May 4, 1988. It was the first song from her debut album, Forever Your Girl (1988). It was written by Kenneth "Babyface" Edmonds, Antonio "L.A." Reid and Daryl Simmons and produced by Babyface and L.A. Reid. ==Personnel== * Paula Abdul: lead and background vocals * Babyface: songwriter, producer, arranger, keyboards, background vocals * L.A. Reid: songwriter, producer, arranger, LM-1 programming, percussion programming * Daryl Simmons: songwriter, arranger, background vocals * Kayo: Memory Moog bass * Pebbles, Yvette Marine: background vocals ==Charts== Chart (1988â€“90) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 82 Canada Contemporary Hit Radio (The Record) 18 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 59 US Urban Contemporary (Radio & Records) 6 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Paula Abdul songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:New jack swing songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Knocked Out
